entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [preview][tizen] 8 and 7 both preview build tizen not works #31366
  • After auto-update VS cant find CrossGen target. #31356
  • Add workload force clean option #19603
    8.0.1xx
  • Backport Docker `--platform` switch support to .NET 7.latest #31133

Updated

  • Workloads distribution and management is understandable and seamless for developers #30008
    .NET 8.0
  • Cannot control verbosity with `dotnet tool restore --verbosity` #27153
    8.0.1xx
  • [Bug]: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets(176,5): error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly. #30755
  • Cannot build release net7.0-ios #31261
  • BindingRedirects not generated for a specific reference #2547
    Discussion
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • dotnet publish large use ram #31259
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Update off by default values with the ASP.NET request delegate source generator assembly name. #31422
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add breaking change notification to the bot #31413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • bump version of the SDK container support to the latest release #31410
    untriaged
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Investigation: check tests running on full framework #31399
    untriaged
  • Choose KnownILCompilerPacks based on TFM + RID #31398
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2142746 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Backport] Workload Clean for 8.0 Preview 3 #31411
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31343
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a typo #26244
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Reenable a skipped cppcli test. #31386
    untriaged
  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build should not show the "Does not support publish of C++/CLI projec… #12333
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make SdkFeatureBand internal (sometimes) #31388
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
